content: mothman socks a knitting pattern designed by emma manos / @emcrafting these mothman-themed socks feature miniature colorwork motifs of the beloved cryptid making for a uniquely cozy and spooky accessory mothman socks knitting pattern / emcrafting overview note on technique this pattern was designed to be knitted in the round on 80 cm the socks are knitted top down from cuff to circular needles using the magic loop toe beginning with a twisted rib cuff technique and instructions are written stranded colorwork in the round a accordingly but feel free to adjust for dpns stockinette heel flap heel turn and gusset if that is your preference the toe is joined with a kitchener stitch and the red eyes are added using a duplicate stitch yarn this pattern was designed using a lighter dk yarn but may also be worked with a sport sizing yarn that can achieve the correct gauge and requires the following approximate this pattern is written for three sizes small quantities medium large finished socks measure approximately 20 cm / 7 ⅞ inches 22 cm / 8 gray 52 g / 125 m / 137 yds 62 g / 149 m / ⅝ inches 24 cm / 9 ½ inches in 163 yds 73 g / 176 m / 192 yds circumference and length of the sock is adjusted to your foot measurements black 43 g / 104 m / 113 yds 51 g / 123 m / 134 yds 60 g / 144 m / 158 yds corresponding shoe sizes red approximately 2 m / 2 ¼ yds for eu shoe sizes 35-37 38-40 41-43 duplicate stitch us women s shoe sizes 5-6 7-9 10-11 the sample shown was knitted in size large using rico essentials merino dk in silver grey black and red gauge 30 sts x 40 rounds = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4 inches notions for colorwork/stockinette scissors 34 sts x 44 rounds = 10 x 10 cm / 4 x 4 inches for twisted ribbing stitch markers tapestry needle materials needles 2 5 mm us 1 5 2 mothman socks knitting pattern / emcrafting abbreviations k knit p purl ssk slip two stitches knitwise then knit the two stitches together k2tog knit two stitches together p2tog purl two stitches together ktbl knit through back loop m1l make one left by picking up a bar between sts and knitting it through the back loop sl slip one stitch purlwise rs right side ws wrong side st/sts stitch/stitches 3 mothman socks knitting pattern / emcrafting instructions heel flap the heel flap is knitted flat across the first 30 33 36 sts of the round cuff with black work the following set of row cast on 60 66 72 sts with black and 2 5 mm back and forth a total of 15 17 18 times us 1 5 needles divide sts evenly over both row 1 rs sl1 k to the end of the row turn needles and join in the
